file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  version: '{{version}}'
  description: ðŸ“¸ website screenshots as a service
  title: website-screenshot
  contact:
    name: Support
    email: mail@tomio.fun
    url: https://github.com/devtomio/website-screenshot/issues/new
  license:
    name: MIT/Apache-2.0
    url: https://github.com/devtomio/website-screenshot#license

paths:
  /:
    get:
      summary: The root route
      tags:
        - HTTP Routes
      operationId: rootRoute
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Hello, world!
        '429':
          description: Ratelimited

  /screenshot:
    post:
      summary: Takes a screenshot of a website
      tags:
        - HTTP Routes
      operationId: postScreenshot
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScreenshotRequest'
        description: Inventory item to add
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScreenshotResponse'
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
        '413':
          description: Payload Too Large
        '429':
          description: Ratelimited
          
  /s/{slug}:
    get:
      summary: Get a screenshot
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: slug
          schema:
            type: string
            example: abcdefghijk
          required: true
          description: The slug of the screenshot
      tags:
        - HTTP Routes
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            image/png:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        '404':
          description: Not Found

servers:
  - url: '{{url}}'

components:
  schemas:
    ScreenshotRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - url
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
          example: https://rust-lang.org
        fullscreen:
          type: boolean
          example: false
        check_nsfw:
          type: boolean
          example: false
        dark_mode:
          type: boolean
          example: false
    ScreenshotResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        slug:
          type: string
          example: abcdefghijk
        path:
          type: string
          example: /s/abcdefghijk
        metadata:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScreenshotRequest'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse servers: at 1:2124: invalid path: {{url}}
